text:
September 2&th, 1950
Pfofessor Johnson Fairchild
The Cooper Union
Cooper Square
New York, N. Y.
Dear Professor Fairchild:
In accordance with your request, I am sending you,
herewith, a map of the NAEB stations which are now
on the Network.
I need not tell you that I am deeply grateful to
you for the good news concerning Cooper Union’s
decision to provide six hundred dollars worth of
tape for this year’s series of lectures to be dis¬
tributed to the NAEB stations.
With all best wishes, I am
Cordially,
Seymour N. Siegel
Director
sns:L
